cards.title: Gangs Of Hackspur
cards.subtitle: I faced academic problems in engineering so I built the platform that help students who were looking to better exam preparation methods.
text: Why I Founded: The academic content we were getting was very uncertain about why we were learning that course. Without a cause it was just a grade-oriented useless education.
Gangs Of Hackspur was a one-stop solution for engineering academic content that I was selling in printed 'Hacks'
I invested 1k INR and sold around 2k. As I was working alone on it and also had academic pressure so I'd to drop it :(

cards.title: Virgin Tutor
cards.subtitle: There should be a platform that helped students in higher standards teach kids in their locality so we built one.
text: Why I Founded: I wanted to teach kids in my 10+2 but there was no platform for that.
Virgin Tutor connects students with their local kids in lower standards.
This was my first 'Zero-Rupee-Invested' startup. We built on the top of Firebase and used Social Media Content creations strategies for user acquisition.
